comment: Export to JSON plugin for PHPMyAdmin

data.question: Has the individual been informed that the enforcement officer and/organization reserves the right to share his/her case data for assistance purposes and only with authorized officers and/or partners?
Has the individual further been informed that the Malawi Government reserves the right to use (Only anonymous, aggregate) data for research purposes?

Has the individual's full and informed consent been obtained to conduct the screening interview based on information given regarding the designation of the enforcement officer, the role of the organization, the voluntary nature of the interview and the use of the information provided by the individual as outlined above?
Type of referring organization
data.possible_answers: NGO, International Organization, Law Enforcement , Immigration, Government, Embassy, International Organization for Immigration (IOM) Mission, Hotline/Tip, Self-Referral/Walk-In, Family, Friend,Client,Other

data.question: Name/Location Of Referring Organization.
Address and Telephone Number Of Referring Organization
Screening Location
Name/Designation/Rank of Interviewer
Interviewee's Language
Interpreter Required? (If Yes enter name of Interpreter)
If Minor, Name(s), Address(es), and telephone number of parents(s) or guardian(s).
How did the individual enter the process?
Did entry into the process include recruitment?
If labour migration, what activity did the individual believe he or she was going to be engaged in following arrival at the final destination (indicate multiple options if necessary).
data.possible_answers: Agricultural Work, Begging, Child Care, Construction, Domestic Work, Factory Work, Fishing, Low-Level criminal activity, Military Service, Prostitution, Restaurants and Hotel Work, Study, Small Street Commerce, Trade, Transport, Other

data.question: What was the individual told would be their benefit following arrival at final destination (Salary Equivalent in US$ per month)?
In which month/year did the individual enter the process?
Was the individual a minor at the time of entry into the process?
What place/country did the individual enter the process?
What place or country is the last (or intended) destination?
Did the individual travel alone? If No, who did the individual travel with? (Multiple options if necessary)
Did the individual spend any time in transit place(s)/country(ies)? If yes who did the person travel with?
If the previous question was "YES", did he/she engage in any activity in this place in first/only transit place/country?
data.possible_answers: NON, Agricultural Work, Begging, Child Care, Construction, Domestic Work, Factory Work, Fishing, Low-Level Criminal Activities, Marriage, Military Service, Mining, Prostitution, Restaurants and Hotel Work, Study, Small Street Commerce, Trade, Transport Sector, Other

data.question: If multiple places/countries, add respective place and activity engaged in.
Was the individual physically abused in order to be controlled?
Was the individual Psychologically abused as a means of controlling them?
Was the individual Sexually abused as a means of controlling them?
Was the individual threatened as a means of controlling them?
Was the individual threatened of action by law enforcement as a means of controlling them?
Was the individual's Family threatened as a means of controlling them? If yes by who? (Recruiter, Transporter/Harbourer/Receiver/Other)
Was the individual given false promises/deceived  as a means of controlling them? If yes By Who? (Recruiter/Transported/Harbourer/Receiver/Other)
Was the individual denied freedom of movement  as a means of controlling them? If yes By Who? (Recruiter/Transported/Harbourer/Receiver/Other)
Was the individual given drugs  as a means of controlling them? If yes By Who? (Recruiter/Transported/Harbourer/Receiver/Other)
Was the individual given alcohol  as a means of controlling them? If yes By Who? (Recruiter/Transported/Harbourer/Receiver/Other)
Was the individual denied medical treatment  as a means of controlling them? If yes By Who? (Recruiter/Transported/Harbourer/Receiver/Others Specify)
Was the individual denied food/drink  as a means of controlling them? If yes By Who? (Recruiter/Transported/Harbourer/Receiver/Other Specify)
Was the individual's identity documents withheld as a means of controlling them? If yes By Who? (Recruiter/Transported/Harbourer/Receiver/Other Specify)
Was the individual's debt and bondage as a means of controlling them? If yes By Who? (Recruiter/Transported/Harbourer/Receiver/Other Specify)
What activity has the individual taken since his/her arrival in the last destination?
data.possible_answers: Agricultural Work, Begging, Child Care, Construction, Domestic Work, Factory Work, Fishing, Low-Level criminal activity, Military Service, Prostitution, Restaurants and Hotel Work, Study, Small Street Commerce, Trade, Transport, Others

data.question: How old was the individual when the activity began?
How Old did the only/most significant activity last?
Were any of the following means used to control the individual during the activity?
Psychological Abuse
Sexual Abuse?
Threat To Individual?
Threat of Action by Law Enforcement?
Other threat to family?
Denial Of Freedom of movement?
Giving Of Drugs?
Giving Of Alcohol?
Denial Of Medical Treatment?
Denial Of Food /Drink?
Withholding Of Food or Wages?
Withholding Of Identity Documents?
Withholding Of Travel Documents?
Debt Bondage?
Excessive Working Hours?
Was the individual denied freedom as a means of sexual exploitation?
Was the individual denied freedom to refuse as a means of sexual exploitation?
Was the individual denied freedom to use  condom as a means of sexual exploitation?
Were there any other means of sexual exploitation? If Yes Please Specify
Did the individual experience exploitation?
If exploitation no was experienced, was there any indication of real and substantial threat of exploitation? (Type "N/A" if question doesn't apply).
If there was exploitation experienced, what were the reasons why exploitation never took place? (Type "N/A" if question doesn't apply).
Are any of the following collaborative material available?
Police or other official reports
Identity documents?
Travel documents?
Medical reports?
Copied employment contract?
Recruitment Offer?
Personal Writings by individual?
Hotline reports?
If other, Specify
Is the individual a trafficked person? Justify this decision with reference questions 1-17 earlier.
Certification that the individual is a trafficked person? (If yes, specify names,  designation and rank).
If the individual is a trafficked person, what was the type of trafficking?
If the individual is not a trafficked person, is he or she in need of assistance? (If Yes, what is the individual's situation?)
Are there any additional remarks to be made? (If Yes, please type below)
